welcome.title: Timesheet
welcome.subtitle: Mobile time tracking for employees
welcome.instructions.title: How it works
welcome.instructions.step1: Enter your name and customer details
welcome.instructions.step3: Sign digitally at the end of the week
welcome.instructions.step5: Done! Your data stays on your device
welcome.privacy.title: Privacy & Data Storage
welcome.privacy.text: All your data is stored exclusively locally on your device. No transmission to external servers takes place. You have full control over your data at all times and can delete it.
welcome.consent: I have read the privacy information and agree to local data storage.
welcome.description: Simple and secure recording of your working hours
timesheet.title: Timesheet
timesheet.customerEmailHelp: Customer will automatically receive a copy of the timesheet
day.shiftConfig.title: Configure Shift Times
day.shiftConfig.dayInfo: Times will be applied to Monday through Friday
day.shiftConfig.lateInfo: Times will be applied to late shift days
day.shiftConfig.nightInfo: Times will be applied to night shift days
signature.drawHint: Draw signature with finger or mouse
export.instructions.title: How it works
actions.confirmClearTimes: Do you want to delete all time entries for this week? Name and customer will be preserved.
actions.confirmDeleteAll: Do you really want to delete all data? This action cannot be undone.
actions.csvExportSuccess: CSV was successfully exported. Would you like to clear the time data for a new week?
actions.deleteAllFinalWarning:

actions.pdfExportSuccess: PDF was successfully exported. Would you like to clear the time data for a new week?
actions.shareSuccess: Timesheet was successfully shared. Would you like to clear the time data for a new week?
errors.shareError: Error sharing. PDF will be downloaded instead.

status.weekLocked: ‚ö†Ô∏è This week is locked and cannot be edited anymore.
footer.dataLocal: All data is stored locally only
pwa.email.subject: WPDL Timesheet - Mobile App
pwa.email.body: Here is the link to the WPDL Timesheet App:
pwa.install.title: Install App
pwa.install.description: Install the app on your device for faster access and offline use.
pwa.ios.step1: Tap the Share icon at the bottom
pwa.ios.step2: Scroll down and select 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa.android.step1: Tap the menu (‚ãÆ) in the top right
pwa.android.step2: Select 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'
pwa.benefits.title: Benefits:
pwa.desktop.title: Open on Mobile Device
pwa.desktop.description: This app is optimized for mobile devices. Scan the QR code with your smartphone.
backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.export.title: Create Backup
backup.export.description: Create a backup copy of all your data for safekeeping.
backup.export.weekData: All week data and time entries
backup.import.title: Restore Backup
backup.import.description: Restore your data from a previously created backup file.
backup.import.warningText: All current data will be replaced by the backup. Create a current backup first.
update.title: Update Available
update.description: A new version of the app is available. Update now for the latest features and improvements.
backupReminder.title: Backup Reminder
backupReminder.description: No backup has been created for more than 7 days. Back up your data regularly to avoid data loss.
dashboard.modals.weekOverview.title: Week Overview
dashboard.modals.weekOverview.noData: No data available for this week
dashboard.modals.monthOverview.title: Month Overview
dashboard.modals.monthOverview.noData: No data available for this month
dashboard.modals.history.title: History
dashboard.modals.contact.title: Contact / Representatives
dashboard.modals.upload.title: Upload File
dashboard.modals.help.title: Help / FAQ
dashboard.modals.help.questions.howToUse: How do I use the app?
dashboard.modals.help.answers.howToUse: Record your working hours in the timesheet, sign at the end of the week, and export the PDF for submission.
dashboard.modals.help.answers.dataStorag: All data is stored exclusively locally on your device. No transmission to external servers takes place.
dashboard.modals.help.questions.exportPd: How do I export my timesheet?
dashboard.modals.help.answers.exportPdf: Open the timesheet, sign it, and click 'Share' to send the PDF.
dashboard.modals.help.answers.offline: Yes, the app works completely offline. All functions are available even without an internet connection.
dashboard.modals.help.questions.deleteDa: How do I delete my data?
dashboard.modals.help.answers.deleteData: In the timesheet, you will find the option 'Delete All Data'. This removes all stored information.
dashboard.modals.language.title: Select Language
actions.confirmLogout: Do you really want to log out?
